name: Chess Royal
description:
If you're looking for a chess game to play with your friends, you're a player looking for a decent and adjustable challenge, or you're in need of a fun, stress-free way to learn how to play chess - you've come to the right place!

Chess Royal.

A Game Of Chess For Everyone!


Main Features:

  • A powerful chess AI to challenge;
  • Local multiplayer - so you can also challenge others;
  • A massive set of chess puzzles to solve and learn chess logic from;
  • Daily puzzles, for those who can't get enough of them!
